title: Drawing, "Design for Armchair", 1927
medium: Graphite, brush and yellow-beige watercolor on illustration board
markings: Embossed artist's monogram, upper right: E.B.
inscribed:
Upper left, in graphite: 5 (encircle) $500
Lower left: Bois recouvert / de galuchat / satin cushion
Lowe right: 4 (encircled) / E. Boiceau
Verso: 244 E. 52
description:
Open-armed sycamore chair covered in lizard; slightly reclining back, straight front legs, splayed back legs. 

Note: invoice in drawing folder records Fauteuil No. 5 frs. 10.500 ($800)

Inscriptions: in graphite, upper left: 5 (encircled) $500
lower left: Bois recouvert / de galuchat / satin cushion
lower right: 4 (encircled) / E. Boiceau
embossed artist's monogram, upper right: EB

Verso: 244 E.52

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Armchair", 1927.Graphite, brush and yellow-beige watercolor on illustration board. 1954-69-1.
